name: Infinit Pachinko
description:
[NOTE] Works best in full screen, click the full screen button in the bottom right corner when the game loads.

Welcome to Infinit Pachinko! The game that's more than meets the eye. Have fun dropping your ball down the board and see where it ends up. You might be surprised how deep it goes...

Instructions on how to play can be found in our main menu under options, have fun!

Game was made over a 72 hour game jam (our team's first!).  

Our team:

Dan Connelly (myself)

Brian Glassman

Sean Lim

Alexander Uboldi

Hank

Justin Wu (our wonderful artist)
